channel.title: Npc problems

item.title: Npc problems
item.dc:creator: @i_want_fire i want fire
item.description:
@i_want_fire wrote:

Alright well today I downloaded a clean 317 and I wanted to put an npc for shops and i got him spawned in with “npcspawn” but when I go to trade him nothing comes up so does anyone have the code where i can trade him? I used this code “else if (NPCID == 531) { // Agnar Food Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 105 ; //Aubury Magic Shop
}”

But it didnt work so can anyone help? (If you need any more codes/info please let me know)

Read full topic
